snippet: The move comes after a suit was filed claiming the insurer had tried to hush up evidence that the bank had opened sham accounts. Wells Fargo also cut off sales of renters’ insurance from Assurant....
abstract: Prudential says it is suspending sales of life insurance polices though Wells Fargo until it finishes inquiry into bank's sales tactics; announcement follows filing of whistle-blower lawsuit against Prudential by former employees who alleged company hid evidence of fraudulent insurance policy sales at Wells Fargo; Alex Perea, Wells Fargo customer and alleged victim of scam, also sues Prudential; Well Fargo stops selling Assurant renters' insurance.
lead_paragraph: The move comes after a suit was filed claiming the insurer had tried to hush up evidence that the bank had opened sham accounts. Wells Fargo also cut off sales of renters’ insurance from Assurant.

headline.main: Prudential Suspends Sales of Its Life Policies by Wells Fargo
headline.print_headline: Prudential, Caught Up in Scandal, Halts Sale of Policies by Wells Fargo
